text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Bahraini press on Sunday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Bahrain's Emir Sheikh Isa bin Sulman al-Khalifa appoints 40 members in the new Shura Council.
- Bahrain to send a memorandum to the International Court of Justice at The Hague in response to Qatar's claim over disputed islands in the Gulf.
- Crown Prince Sheikh Hamad discusses with his Saudi counterpart Prince Abdullah the situation in the region and bilateral relations.
- Bahrain arrests four suspects accused of an arson attack in Manama in which three people were injured, one seriously.
